#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/list-example.json
curl --location --request POST 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/List \' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"List","id":"517d7e1d-8d4f-473f-bcdd-f8c4ca98a8b2","identifier":[{"system":"urn:uuid:a9fcea7c-fcdf-4d17-a5e0-f26dda030b59","value":"23974652"}],"status":"current","mode":"changes","subject":{"reference":"Patient/example"},"encounter":{"reference":"Encounter/example"},"date":"2012-11-25T19:17:00+08:00","source":{"reference":"Patient/example"},"entry":[{"flag":{"text":"Deleted due to error"},"deleted":true,"item":{"reference":"Condition/example"}},{"flag":{"text":"Added"},"item":{"reference":"Condition/example2"}}],"meta":{"tag":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason","code":"HTEST","display":"test health data"}],"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:16.980+08:00"}}'
x-codeSamples.label: cURL
